availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
State of California --
City & County of San Francisco } ss

I James R. Garniss having been appointed by the Governor of the state of Kentucky a Commissioner within and for the state of California to administer oaths and take depositions and affidavits to be used in said state of Kentucky and the acknowledgment of Deeds and other instruments to be used or recorded therein Do solemnly swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such Commissioner, as prescribed by the Laws of said state, So help me God.

State of California --
City & County of San Francisco } ss
On this 2d day of April One thousand eight hundred and sixty two personally appeared the aforesaid James R. Garniss and took and subscribed the foregoing oath -- Before me --

Washington Bartlett,
Clerk of the County Court.

figure.ab:
COUNTY COURT OF SAN FRANCISCO COUNTY
CALIFORNIA

body.p:
California
$5 --
Comr. of Deeds
Oath
Jas. R. Garniss
Filed Nov 21. 1862
